messages.content: Payment kar diya hai lekin confirmation nahi aaya.
Aapka payment receive ho gaya hai. Confirmation email bheja gaya hai.
Delivery delay ho rahi hai, reason batayein.
Hum asuvidha ke liye khed hai. Delivery delay shipment partner ke karan hai.
Mujhe promo code apply karna nahi aa raha.
Promo code apply karne ke liye checkout page par option milega.
Mujhe promo code apply karna nahi aa raha.
Promo code apply karne ke liye checkout page par option milega.
Agar product defective ho to kya karna hoga?
Agar product defective hai to kripya image bhejkar complaint raise karein.
Order duplicate ho gaya hai, ek cancel karna hai.
Duplicate order cancel kar diya gaya hai. Aapko refund mil jaayega.
Kya aap EMI options provide karte hain?
Haan, hum selected banks ke liye EMI options provide karte hain.
Order duplicate ho gaya hai, ek cancel karna hai.
Duplicate order cancel kar diya gaya hai. Aapko refund mil jaayega.
Kya aap international shipping karte hain?
Haan, hum selected countries mein delivery karte hain.
Kya mujhe invoice mil sakta hai?
Aapka invoice aapke email par bhej diya gaya hai.
Mujhe address update karna hai order ke liye.
Aapka address update ho gaya hai. Naya address se delivery hogi.
Mujhe address update karna hai order ke liye.
Aapka address update ho gaya hai. Naya address se delivery hogi.
Kya mujhe invoice mil sakta hai?
Aapka invoice aapke email par bhej diya gaya hai.
Return policy ke baare mein batayein.
Hamari return policy 7 dinon ki hai. Product unused hona chahiye.
Mujhe previous orders ka record chahiye.
Aapke previous orders 'My Orders' section mein available hain.
Mujhe apne account details update karni hai.
Kripya login karke account section mein details update karein.
Mujhe refund kab tak milega?
Refund process mein 5–7 business days lagte hain.
Mujhe apne account details update karni hai.
Kripya login karke account section mein details update karein.
Mujhe product exchange karna hai.
Exchange initiate karne ke liye return form bharna hoga.
Product ke saath warranty card nahi aaya.
Kripya warranty card ke liye support team se sampark karein.
Kya mujhe invoice mil sakta hai?
Aapka invoice aapke email par bhej diya gaya hai.
Kya mera order dispatch ho gaya hai?
Haan, aapka order dispatch ho chuka hai. Tracking link bhej rahe hain.
Order cancel karna hai, process kya hai?
Order cancel karne ke liye login karke 'My Orders' mein jaayein.
Mujhe apne order ka status check karna hai.
Kripya apna order ID batayein, hum status turant check karenge.
Aapke customer care ka contact number kya hai?
Humara toll-free number hai 1800-123-4567.
